title: Wrangler Men's 20X Extreme Relaxed Fit Jeans
description: RELAXED FIT. Designed with an extra-relaxed fit through the seat and thigh, this jean leaves extra room through the leg to keep you comfortable in the saddle with room for your favorite pair of boots.

VERSATILE WEAR. Ready for a long day of work or casual weekends, this extra-relaxed jeans will keep you comfortable all day long. Pair with your favorite Wrangler button-down shirt for a signature western-inspired look.
BUILT TO LAST. Made with durable materials, these jeans won't hold you back. Available in a number of finishes and washes - choose a pair that best fits your style.
HEAVY-DUTY HARDWARE. Finished with a zipper fly, button closure and embroidered back pockets.
FIVE-POCKET STYLE. This 5-pocket jean is made with (2) front pockets, (2) back pockets and (1) coin pocket.
